Hero.Description: I am a stuttering boy with a great passion for technology that who wishes to improve his technical knowledge and grow as a person every day.

Projects.Heading: My projects
Projects.Description1: It's the fronted of an inventory system that registers enterprise devices according to serial no., proprietary of device and department that they belong.
Projects.Description2: It's the API REST of inventory. In this project, I learned to use ASP.NET Core to create the web API. I created an user authentication using JWT
Projects.Description3: It's a website about a bakery. It is created with React.js using React js.
Projects.Description5: This project was created consuming the POKEAPI. In this project you can search for Pokémon by their ID or Name and you can consult the first 151 Pokémon the Kanto region.
Projects.Description6: My own API REST about products. This was my first project in ASP.NET Core
Projects.Description7: An application by console of an basic CRUD about peoples where I used OOP for keep the information in arrays.
